profile.intro: I am a Senior Software Engineer in NYC. Developer Experience is my specialty but I also have a wide range of experience in Product Engineering.
profile.contact: Want to get in touch? Contact me using one of the methods below!

projects.name: Text Adventure
projects.description: A text-based game engine written in Typescript. Runs in-browser and in your terminal!

projects.name: Which Exchange
projects.description: Guess which StackExchange site each question comes from! HackNJIT 2015 project.

projects.name: Reddit Backgrounds
projects.description: Scrape multiple subreddits for high resolution wallpapers. HackRPI 2015 project.

projects.name: Spotify Backup
projects.description: Back up your Spotify playlist metadata via the Spotify API.

projects.name: Geddit
projects.description: Reddit clone written from scratch in Ruby on Rails.

projects.name: House Explorer
projects.description: A text-based game engine written in Python.

jobs.title: Senior Software Engineer - Engineering Productivity
jobs.description: Built our EngProd team from 0 to 1. Embedded with Product teams and worked on their projects to identify issues with our development environments and release process (I designed and built our Sign in with Apple integration). Many technical Productivity tasks like Typescript/TypeORM/Storybook upgrades, large codebase refactors that drastically improved developer onboarding, and improvements to Rush and our local development experience.

jobs.title: Senior Software Engineer - Developer Experience
jobs.description: DevX team of one! I embedded in our Product engineering teams, identified issues, and built the solutions from start to finish. Projects ranged from affecting our engineers directly (upgrading 20+ services from Python 3.7 to 3.10, fixing a bunch of M1-compatibility issues with our dev tools) to more behind-the-scenes (re-architecting of our self-hosted end to end test runners and bastion hosts).

jobs.title: Software Engineer - Product
jobs.description: Developed and launched a new single-pane-of-glass dashboard for home buyers using Orchard's services. Automated real estate contract population and signing with Docusign. Built a wide-reaching bi-directional sync with Salesforce.

jobs.title: Software Engineer
jobs.description: Developed software powering remote Datto backup appliances, web management portals, and Datto's private storage cloud. Participated in several small, high-velocity task forces that converted Datto's fleet of 75,000 devices to an image-based upgrade strategy and build a scalable storage backend for Datto's Cloud Continuity backup agent.

jobs.title: Azure Machine Learning Development Intern
jobs.description: Working as a member of a small development team under AzureML, optimized a polling-based communication system in AzureML's backend using notifications through Azure ServiceBus.

jobs.title: Cloud Development Intern
jobs.description: Wrote and maintained code running on Datto's web portals, on-site devices, and storage nodes. Also worked on internal tooling for user account management.

jobs.title: C#/.NET Development Intern
jobs.description: Fixed bugs and developed new features for RSA's .NET-based suite of printer ticket transformation programs.
